channel.title: Server Login, people login for 5 secs, than get booted
channel.description:
Hi there
I'm putting up a server for just me and my friends, downloaded the "Exion" source. I can log in with my exion client tho, but when they use a 317 client with ip changer, they log in for 5 secs, than get booted. I did port forwarding and stuff, and it should work.
Someone tell me how to fix this?

item.title: Server Login, people login for 5 secs, than get booted
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

They also have to be using an exion client to be able to connect to an exion server and actually play, considering a 317 with an ip changer doesn’t have the correct workings to go with an exion server Understand?
It’s like trying to make a Square fit into a Circular hole, it wont work.

Read full topic
item.source: Server Login, people login for 5 secs, than get booted
